page.syntax: C Record_content_get(C content_expression[,C order[,C filter[,N fetchLevel]]])
page.description: Retrieve record data in a cr-lf separated list.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.RECORD_CONTENT_GET() Syntax Record_List as C = &ltTBL>.RECORD_CONTENT_GET( Expression as C [, Order as C [, Filter as C ]] ) ArgumentDescription Record_ListA CR-LF delimited list of values, one per record. ExpressionAn expression that references one or more fields from the table. OrderOptional. Default = the current order. FilterOptional. Default = the current filter.
Description The &ltTBL>.RECORD_CONTENT_GET()retrieves a CR-LF delimited list of the fields specified by Expression. This method is faster than TABLE.EXTERNAL_RECORD_CONTENT_GET() when used with a table that is already open. Example dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") tbl.query_create("", "bill_state_region = 'ny'") ? tbl.record_content_get("lastname + bill_state_region") = Feld NY Dubi NY Phillips NY Carr NY Barber NY Bernstein NY Baker NY Harris NY
? tbl.record_content_get("lastname + bill_state_region", "lastname", .t.") = Abrams NE Adams HI Baker NY Barber NY Bernstein NY Boschetti SC Burtonski CA Cario MA Carr NY Clifton VA Copen MA Dawson MA Dodds AZ
